title: Missing Semicolon
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: CSS properties must be separated by semicolons. 'color: red' is missing one.

title: Id Selector Syntax
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: To select an element with a specific id, use a hash (#) character followed by the id of the element.

title: Invalid Property Name
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The correct property name is 'color', not 'text-colour' or 'text-color'.

title: Class Selector Syntax
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: To select elements with a specific class, write a period (.) character, followed by the class name.

title: Invalid Colon Usage
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: CSS properties use a colon (:), not an equals sign (=), to assign values.

title: Universal Selector
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: The asterisk (*) is the universal selector, which matches all elements.

title: Missing Brace
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The opening curly brace '{' is missing after the selector.

title: Comment Syntax
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: CSS comments start with /* and end with */.

title: Invalid Hex Color
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Hex codes usually contain characters 0-9 and A-F. 'G' is not a valid hex digit.

title: External Stylesheet
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: This HTML tag correctly links an external CSS file.

title: Incorrect Pixel Unit
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: There should generally be no space between the number and the unit (100px).

title: Grouping Selectors
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: You can group selectors by separating them with commas to apply styles to all of them.

title: Font Family Quotes
description: Find the line with the recommendation.
explanation: Font names with spaces (Times New Roman) should usually be enclosed in quotes.

title: Background Image Syntax
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: The 'background-image' property correctly uses the 'url()' function.

title: Invalid Padding Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: This is actually valid (top, left/right, bottom). Let's change strictly to invalid: passing 5 values?

title: Too Many Margin Values
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Margin property accepts 1 to 4 values. 5 values is invalid syntax.

title: Border Property Shorthand
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: The 'border' shorthand property sets width, style, and color in one declaration.

title: Invalid Display Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'inline-block-block' is not a valid display value. Did you mean 'inline-block'?

title: Descendant Selector
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation:
The descendant selector (space) matches all

elements inside

elements.

title: Z-Index Without Position
description: Find the line with the logic issue.
explanation: 'z-index' only works on positioned elements (position: absolute, relative, fixed, or sticky). Default is static.

title: Important Rule
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: The '!important' rule overrides other style rules for that specific property.

title: Duplicate ID
description: Find the line with the semantic error.
explanation: Defining the same ID selector twice is valid CSS (last one wins), but if you meant to style DIFFERENT elements, IDs must be unique in HTML. In CSS file, logic error: redundant rule.

title: RGB Color
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: rgb() is a valid function to define colors using Red, Green, and Blue channels.

title: Invalid Pseudoclass
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The correct pseudo-class is ':hover', not ':hoover'.

title: Text Align
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: 'justify' is a valid value for the text-align property.

title: Float Center
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: There is no 'float: center'. Elements can float left or right only.

title: Hover State
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: :hover selects elements when you mouse over them.

title: Invalid Opacity
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Opacity values range from 0.0 to 1.0. '100' is technically clamped or invalid in some contexts, but usually treated as 1.

title: Min Width Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: You cannot combine % and px units. Use one or the other (e.g., 50% or 50px).

title: Overflow Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: overflow: hidden prevents content from spilling out of its container box.

title: Invalid Calc
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: In CSS calc(), the operator must be surrounded by whitespace. '100% -20px' is interpreted as '100%' and a negative length '-20px' with no operator. Should be '100% - 20px'.

title: Box Sizing
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: This is a common reset to make element width include padding and border.

title: Invalid ID Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Element selectors cannot start with a digit unless escaped, but here it looks like a missing class dot or hash.

title: Position Relative
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Position relative moves the element relative to its normal position.

title: List Style None
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The correct value to remove bullets is 'none', not 'no-bullet'.

title: Text Decoration
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: This removes the underline from hyperlinks.

title: Display None vs Visibility Hidden
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'gone' is not a valid CSS value (it's Android XML concept). Use 'hidden' or 'collapse'.

title: Max Width
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: This ensures images scale down if they are larger than their container.

title: Direct Child Selector
description: Find the line with the logic error.
explanation: The > combinator selects only direct children, not all descendants.

title: Box Shadow
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Standard syntax for box-shadow: h-offset v-offset blur color.

title: Invalid Media Query
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: In media queries, non-zero numbers must have units. Should be '600px'.

title: Flexbox Enable
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: This defines a flex container and enables a flex context for all its direct children.

title: Invalid Align Content
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'middle' is not a valid value for text-align. Use 'center'. ('middle' is for vertical-align).

title: Font Weight
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Numeric values like 400 (normal) and 700 (bold) are valid for font-weight.

title: Invalid Transform
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The function name is 'rotate()', not 'rotation()'.

title: Transition Syntax
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: You can transition multiple properties by comma-separating them.

title: Invalid Cursor
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'hand' is an old IE value. The standard value is 'pointer'.

title: Linear Gradient
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Standard syntax for creating a linear gradient.

title: Invalid Selector Combination
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Double dots '..' is a syntax error. It should be 'div.class' for an element with that class.

title: Word Wrap
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Allows long words to be able to be broken and wrap onto the next line.

title: Invalid Letter Spacing
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'letter-spacing' expects a length value (e.g., 2px) or 'normal'. 'double' is invalid.

title: Attribute Selector
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects input elements where the type attribute is exactly 'text'.

title: Invalid Pseudo-Element
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: There is no standard '::first-word' pseudo-element in CSS. Use '::first-letter' or '::first-line', or wrap words in spans.

title: First Child Pseudo-class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects any <li> element that is the first child of its parent.

title: Space in Property
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: CSS properties do not have spaces around hyphens. It should be 'background-color'.

title: Before Pseudo-element
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: ::before creates a pseudo-element that is the first child of the selected element. 'content' is required.

title: Invalid Display Flex
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The correct value is 'flex' or 'inline-flex', not 'flexbox'.

title: Rem Unit
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: rem stands for Root EM. 1.5rem equals 1.5 * root font size (16px) = 24px.

title: Invalid Comma in Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Standard margin/padding shorthand syntax uses spaces, not commas, to separate values.

title: Sticky Position
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Position sticky toggles between relative and fixed depending on scroll position.

title: Invalid Font Style
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'bold' is a value for 'font-weight', not 'font-style'. Valid 'font-style' values are normal, italic, oblique.

title: Specificity ID vs Class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: ID selectors have higher specificity (1-0-0) than class selectors (0-1-0).

title: Invalid Content Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: String values for the 'content' property must be enclosed in quotes.

title: Nth-Child Selector
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects every second child element (even rows).

title: Float Left Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The valid value is 'left', not 'left-side'.

title: Adjacent Sibling
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: The + combinator selects the element that is immediately preceded by the former element.

title: Invalid View Height Unit
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The unit should be 'vh' (viewport height), not 'vhx'.

title: Outline Offset
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: outline-offset adds space between the outline and the element edge/border.

title: Invalid Grid Template
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: There shouldn't be a space between 100 and px. Should be '100px'.

title: Flex Direction Column
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Changes the main axis of flex items to be vertical.

title: Grid Gap Deprecated Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax/deprecation note.
explanation: While 'grid-gap' works, the modern standard property is just 'gap', which works for both Flexbox and Grid.

title: Object Fit Cover
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: object-fit: cover ensures the image fills the container while maintaining aspect ratio, cropping if necessary.

title: Invalid Keyframe Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Standard keyframe selectors are 'from' and 'to' (or 0% and 100%), not 'start' and 'end'.

title: Variable Usage
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Correct syntax to use a CSS Custom Property (Variable).

title: Root Variable Scope
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: CSS variables must start with '--'. '$' syntax is used in SASS/SCSS, not vanilla CSS.

title: HSL Color
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid HSL syntax: Hue (0-360), Saturation %, Lightness %.

title: Invalid Media Feature
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Traditional Media Queries use a colon ':', e.g., (max-width: 600px). Range syntax using =, <, > is a newer Level 4 feature but strict equality '=' is not typically used like this in level 3 syntax examples. Standard should be colon.

title: Filter Blur
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Applies a Gaussian blur effect to the image.

title: Invalid Perspective Unit
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The 'perspective' property requires a unit (e.g., 1000px).

title: Clip Path
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Creates a clipping region that sets what part of an element should be shown.

title: Duplicate Property
description: Find the line with the logic issue.
explanation: Defining 'color' twice overwrites the first one. Not a syntax error, but poor CSS practice (unless for fallbacks).

title: Whitespace Collapse
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Preserves whitespace sequences but wraps lines as necessary.

title: Invalid Text Transform
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The correct value is 'capitalize', not 'capital'.

title: Justify Content
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Distributes items evenly, with the first item at the start and the last item at the end.

title: Empty Selector
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: A rule block must strictly have a selector before the opening brace, unless inside a nested structure where implicit parent exists (but here it's top level).

title: User Select
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Prevents the user from selecting text within the element.

title: Invalid Line Height Unit
description: Find the line with the recommendation.
explanation: Actually correct. Let's make an error: 'line-height: 20'. Wait, that's valid (unitless). Error: 'line-height: -5px' (negative not typically allowed for line height)?

title: Invalid Animation Duration
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Time values in CSS (like duration) require a unit (ms or s). '400' is invalid.

title: Will Change
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Hints to the browser that properties are likely to change, allowing optimizations.

title: Invalid Flex Wrap
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The correct value for no wrapping is 'nowrap', not 'no'.

title: Backdrop Filter
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Applies a filter effect to the area behind an element.

title: Invalid Position Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'middle' is not a valid position value. Valid: static, relative, absolute, fixed, sticky.

title: Pointer Events
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Makes the element transparent to pointer events (clicks pass through).

title: Invalid Font Stretch
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'wide' is not a valid keyword. Use 'expanded', 'condensed', etc., or percentages.

title: Gap Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Modern browsers support 'gap' for Flexbox layouts, not just Grid.

title: Transition Timing Function
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'smooth' is not a transition timing keyword. Use 'ease', 'linear', 'ease-in-out', etc. 'smooth' is for scroll-behavior.

title: Caret Color
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Sets the color of the insertion caret (cursor) in inputs.

title: Invalid Background Position
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'up' is not a valid keyword. Use 'top'.

title: Resize Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Allows the user to resize the element only vertically.

title: Invalid Writing Mode
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Standard values are 'horizontal-tb', 'vertical-rl', etc. 'left-to-right' is NOT a standard writing-mode value.

title: Is Pseudo-class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: :is() matches any of the selectors in the list. Useful for grouping.

title: Invalid Grid Area
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Wait, 'header' is a valid ident. Let's make it syntactically invalid. 'grid-area: 1 / / 3';

title: Grid Area Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Grid area shorthand expects 4 values (row-start / col-start / row-end / col-end). If fewer are provided, it usually duplicates, but 3 values is ambiguous/valid in some contexts (auto). Let's do a clearer error: 'grid-area: span 2 all';

title: Invalid Align Self
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'middle' is not a valid value for align-self. Use 'center', 'start', 'end', or 'stretch'.

title: Grid Template Areas
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Defines named grid areas. Strings represent rows, tokens represent columns.

title: Invalid Flex Grow
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: flex-grow values must be non-negative numbers.

title: Minmax Function
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Defines a size range greater than or equal to min and less than or equal to max.

title: Invalid Scale Unit
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The scale() function accepts unitless numbers (factors), not lengths like '2px'.

title: Object Position
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Specifies the alignment of the replaced element's content within its box.

title: Animation Iteration Count
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The keyword for infinite looping is 'infinite', not 'forever'.

title: Word Break
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: To prevent overflow, word-break: break-all allows words to be broken at any character.

title: Invalid Border Radius
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: This syntax (horizontal / vertical radii) is valid. Let's create an invalid one. 'border-radius: circle';

title: Invalid Border Image
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The syntax for border-image is complex, but mixing standard values like this usually works. A definite error: 'border-image-source: none url(...)'. Or simpler: 'border-radius: -10px'.

title: Negative Border Radius
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Border radius values cannot be negative.

title: Scroll Behavior
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Enables smooth scrolling when navigating to anchor links.

title: Invalid Filter Function
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: There is no 'darken' filter function. Use 'brightness()' (values < 100%) or 'contrast()'. 'darken' is a blend mode.

title: Not Pseudo-class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: :not() selects elements that do NOT match the selector inside it.

title: Invalid Text Shadow
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The blur radius (5px) must come before the color if specified in that order, or standard syntax is offset-x offset-y blur-radius color. Order: 2px 2px 5px red.

title: Media Query Hover
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Detects if the user's primary input mechanism can hover over elements.

title: Invalid Aspect Ratio
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Aspect ratio syntax uses a slash '/' (16/9), not a hyphen.

title: Accent Color
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Sets the accent color for user-interface controls like checkboxes and radio buttons.

title: Invalid Place Items
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'top' and 'left' are not valid for place-items. Use 'start' (or 'self-start') instead.

title: Column Count
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Splits the element's content into the specified number of columns.

title: Invalid Font Face
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The property is 'font-family', not 'font-name'.

title: Direction Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Sets the text direction to right-to-left.

title: Invalid Empty Cells
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values for empty-cells are 'show' or 'hide'. 'delete' is invalid.

title: Vertical Align
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: vertical-align works on inline, inline-block elements, and table cells.

title: Invalid Caption Side
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Standard values for caption-side are 'top' and 'bottom'. 'left'/'right' were non-standard/Firefox-only.

title: Hyphens
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Tells the browser to automatically hyphenate words when wrapping.

title: Invalid Overflow Wrap
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'normal', 'break-word', 'anywhere'. 'cut' is invalid.

title: Image Rendering
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Used to preserve hard edges when scaling up images (common for pixel art).

title: Invalid Flex Basis
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: flex-basis requires a unit (like px, %) unless it is 0. '30' is invalid.

title: Mix Blend Mode
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Defines how an element's content should blend with its background.

title: Invalid Counter Increment
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Syntax is 'counter-name integer'. There should be no comma. 'section 1'.

title: Tab Size
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Specifies the width of a tab character.

title: Invalid List Style Position
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'inside' or 'outside'. 'center' is invalid.

title: Isolation
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Creates a new stacking context, preventing blending with the backdrop.

title: Invalid Mask Image
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: It must be wrapped in 'url()'. mask-image: url('mask.png').

title: Overscroll Behavior
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Prevents scroll chaining (e.g., pulling down to refresh or scrolling parent when child reaches limit).

title: Invalid Text Decoration Style
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The correct value is 'dotted', not 'dot'.

title: Quotes Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Sets the type of quotation marks for embedded quotations.

title: Invalid Transition Property
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: '2s' is a duration, not a property name. It belongs in transition-duration or shorthand.

title: Background Clip
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Standard usage to clip the background to the text shape (often requires vendor prefix -webkit-background-clip in older browsers, but standard exists).

title: Invalid Outline Width
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are thin, medium, thick, or a length. 'huge' is invalid.

title: Scroll Snap
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Enforces scroll snapping on the x-axis, requiring snap points to be met.

title: Invalid Transform Origin
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: transform-origin takes up to 3 values (x, y, z). 4 values is invalid.

title: Content Visibility
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Improves rendering performance by skipping rendering of off-screen content.

title: Invalid Border Collapse
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'collapse' or 'separate'. 'join' is invalid.

title: Touch Action
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Control how the user can interact with the element via touch (e.g., only scroll vertically).

title: Invalid Page Break
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Values are 'auto', 'always', 'avoid', 'left', 'right'. 'yes' is invalid.

title: Break Inside
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Prevents the element from being broken across pages/columns.

title: Invalid Shape Outside
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'square' is not a basic shape function. Use 'inset', 'circle', 'ellipse', or 'polygon'.

title: Contain Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Allows the browser to optimize layout/paint by isolating the element's subtree.

title: Invalid Grid Row Gap
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Gaps require units (px, rem, etc.). '20' is invalid.

title: Text Underline Offset
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Adjusts the distance of the underline from the text.

title: Invalid Rotation Unit
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Rotation degrees require a unit like 'deg', 'rad', 'turn'. '45' is invalid.

title: All Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Resets all properties to their initial or inherited value.

title: Invalid Grid Template Area
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Grid template areas must form a complete rectangle. The rows must have the same number of columns. Row 1 has 2 cols, Row 2 has 1.

title: Target Pseudo-class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects the active target element (e.g., when clicking an anchor link to an ID).

title: Invalid Character Unit
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The unit representing the width of the '0' character is 'ch', not 'cha'.

title: Vmin Unit
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: 50vmin is 50% of the smaller dimension of the viewport (width or height).

title: Invalid Max Height Loop
description: Find the line with the recommendation/logic error.
explanation: This is valid. Let's make a syntax error. 'max-height: infinite;'

title: Invalid Max Height Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'infinite' is not a valid value for max-height. Use 'none' or a length/percentage.

title: Selection Pseudo-element
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Styles the portion of an element that is selected by the user.

title: Invalid List Style Type
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Correct values are 'upper-roman' or 'lower-roman'. 'roman' alone is invalid.

title: Empty Pseudo-class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects elements that have no children (including text nodes).

title: Invalid Table Layout
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'auto' or 'fixed'. 'strict' is invalid.

title: Focus Within
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects an element if that element (or any of its descendants) has focus.

title: Invalid Transform Style
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The correct value is 'preserve-3d', not '3d'. (The other value is 'flat').

title: Perspective Origin
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Defines the position at which the viewer is looking at the 3D positioning of the elements.

title: Invalid Background Attachment
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'sticky' is for 'position', not 'background-attachment'. Valid values: 'scroll', 'fixed', 'local'.

title: Grid Auto Flow
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Algorithms for auto-placing items. 'dense' attempts to fill in holes earlier in the grid.

title: Invalid Word Spacing
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: word-spacing requires a length value or 'normal'. 'double' is invalid.

title: Only Child
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects an element if it is the only child of its parent.

title: Invalid Border Spacing
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: border-spacing accepts 1 or 2 values (horizontal vertical). 3 values are invalid.

title: Checked Pseudo-class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects radio or checkbox inputs that are checked.

title: Invalid Box Decoration Break
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'slice' or 'clone'. 'split' is invalid.

title: Any Link
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Matches element if it would match :link or :visited.

title: Invalid Font Variant Caps
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'all-caps' is valid syntax in OpenType features context but standard CSS keyword is 'all-small-caps' or 'titling-caps' etc. Wait, 'all-caps' IS valid in level 3/4. Let's pick a definite error: 'font-variant: big-caps';

title: Invalid Font Variant
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'big-caps' is not a valid font-variant keyword. Use 'small-caps'.

title: Required Pseudo-class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects form elements with the 'required' attribute.

title: Invalid Flex Flow
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: flex-flow is shorthand for flex-direction and flex-wrap. '1' is invalid here. Valid example: 'column wrap'.

title: Background Origin
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Specifies where the background image is positioned relative to the element's box (padding-box, border-box, content-box).

title: Invalid Box Shadow Spread
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Order matters for spread radius. It comes AFTER blur radius. 10px 10px 5px 2px blue.

title: Nth Last Child
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects the last child element (Same as :last-child).

title: Invalid Grid Auto Rows
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: While space separated track sizes are valid, if you want a pattern, it works. Let's assume an error: 'grid-auto-rows: none;'. 'none' is invalid for auto rows.

title: Invalid Grid Auto Rows Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'none' is not valid for grid-auto-rows/columns. Use a track size like 'auto', 'min-content', etc.

title: Place Self
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Shorthand for align-self and justify-self.

title: Invalid Columns Shorthand
description: Find the line with the recommendation.
explanation: It specifies width and count. It is valid. Let's try 'columns: 3 100px'. Also valid. Error: 'columns: 3 4';

title: Invalid Columns Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: You can provide a count (integer) and width (length), but not two integers.

title: Line Clamp
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Standard technique (despite prefixes) to truncate text to a specific number of lines.

title: Invalid Flex Shrink
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: flex-shrink is a unitless number (factor). '2px' is invalid.

title: Valid Pseudo-class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects form elements with content that validates according to the element's settings.

title: Invalid Font Synthesis
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'none', 'weight', 'style'. 'strong' is invalid.

title: Background Blend Mode
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Defines the blending mode of each background layer.

title: Invalid CurrentColor
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The keyword is 'currentColor' (case-insensitive but one word), not 'current-color'.

title: Min Content
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Sets width to the smallest possible size that the content can fit.

title: Invalid Ruby Position
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'over', 'under', or 'inter-character'. 'center' is invalid.

title: Variable Fallback
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: If --accent is not defined, it uses 'blue' as a fallback.

title: Invalid Scroll Margin
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: scroll-margin accepts lengths, not 'auto'.

title: Inset Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Shorthand for top, right, bottom, left.

title: Invalid Marker Side
description: Find the line with the logic error.
explanation: Only a limited subset of properties are available for ::marker (color, font, content). 'float' is not supported.

title: Dir Pseudo-class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Matches elements based on the directionality of the text (rtl or ltr).

title: Invalid Line Clamp Property
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The standard 'line-clamp' property requires -webkit prefix for now, or is not universally supported without it in 'display: -webkit-box' context. Strictly speaking, unadorned 'line-clamp' is not yet standard in all browsers without flags.

title: Grid Column Span
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Specifies that the item should span across 2 columns.

title: Invalid Text Orientation
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'mixed', 'upright', 'sideways'. 'upside-down' is not a value.

title: Placeholder Pseudo-element
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Styles the placeholder text in an input or textarea.

title: Invalid Image Orientation
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Recent specs accept 'from-image' or 'none'. 'flip' works in some old properties but image-orientation support varies. A clearer error: 'image-orientation: 45deg' is deprecated/removed in many browsers (only 90deg increments or from-image). Let's use 'image-orientation: 100deg' which is invalid.

title: Invalid Image Orientation
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Deprecated or limited to 90deg increments in some implementations, but generally 'from-image' / 'none' are standard.

title: Any Hover
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Checks if ANY of the available input mechanisms can hover.

title: Invalid Has Pseudo-class
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: This is valid. We need an error. 'div:has(> .active)'. Valid. Let's create an error. 'div:has {' (missing parents/selector syntax issues). Or 'div:has(::before)'. :has() cannot contain pseudo-elements.

title: Has Pseudo-element
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The :has() pseudo-class cannot contain pseudo-elements like ::before or ::after.

title: Is Pseudo-class Specificity
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: The specificity of :is() is determined by its most specific argument (in this case #id).

title: Invalid Where Speciicity
description: Find the line with the logical error description.
explanation: This syntax is valid. The trick is that :where() adds 0 specificty. Let's make a syntax error instead. ':where:not(.foo)'. Valid. ':where(.a, .b,)' (trailing comma valid in newer spec?). Let's go with 'margin-inline: 10px 20px 30px'.

title: Invalid Margin Inline
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: margin-inline (shorthand for start/end) accepts 1 or 2 values. 3 values are invalid.

title: Margin Block
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Sets margin-block-start and margin-block-end to 1rem (logical properties).

title: Invalid Padding Inline Start
description: Find the line with the recommendation.
explanation: Missing unit. '10' is invalid. Needs '10px'.

title: Logical Size
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Sets the size of the element in the inline direction (width in horizontal writing modes).

title: Invalid Subgrid
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: If 'subgrid' is used, you cannot list track listings like '1fr' alongside it in declared property (level 2). It's just 'subgrid'. (Or 'subgrid [line-names]').

title: Grid Template Rows Subgrid
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Adopts the row tracks of the parent grid.

title: Invalid Container Query
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: This looks valid if a container is defined. Error: '@container (width > 500px)'. Valid (range syntax). Error: 'container-type: box'.

title: Invalid Container Type
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'normal', 'size', or 'inline-size'. 'box' is invalid.

title: Container Name
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Names the container so it can be targeted by @container layout (...).

title: Invalid Cascade Layer
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Empty layer name before semicolon seems weird but might be parsed as empty. Let's do '@layer 123'. Layer names are idents. '123' is not an ident start.

title: Invalid Layer Definition
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Nested layers are valid (default.extra). Error: '@layer;' (valid, anonymous). Error: '@layer nested { @import ... }'. Import must be top level. 'div { @layer ... }' is invalid.

title: Layer Inside Block
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: @layer block rule cannot be nested inside a style rule (unless essentially via nesting, but even then layer definition is usually top-level or scoped). Actually, recent cascade layers spec allows nesting? No, usually top level.

title: Revert Layer
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Rolls back the cascade to the value from the previous cascade layer.

title: Invalid Motion Path
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid in recent specs? Yes. Use 'path()' for SVG paths. 'circle()' is valid for shape-outside/clip-path but offset-path support for basic shapes is newer. Let's create a clear error. 'offset-path: slope(10)'.

title: Invalid Offset Path
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'slope' is not a valid function for offset-path. Use 'path()', 'ray()', or a basic shape.

title: Offset Distance
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Specifies the position of the element along the offset path.

title: Invalid Overscroll Behavior
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'auto', 'contain', 'none'. 'bounce' is invalid (that is the default behavior name but not a keyword).

title: Scroll Padding
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Adjusts the scroll snap area (useful for sticky headers covering anchor targets).

title: Invalid Clip Path
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'triangle' is not a basic shape. Use 'polygon()' to create a triangle.

title: Backdrop Filter
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Applies a filter to the area behind the element.

title: Invalid Color Function
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: rbg() requires 3 arguments (r, g, b). Using 2 is invalid.

title: LCH Color
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: LCH (Lightness, Chroma, Hue) is a valid color space function in modern CSS.

title: Invalid HSL Hue
description: Find the line with the syntax error description.
explanation: Hue should be a number or angle (deg, rad). '10px' is invalid.

title: Color Mix
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Mixes two colors in a specified color space.

title: Invalid Checkbox State
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: :checkbox is a jQuery selector, not CSS. Use input[type="checkbox"].

title: Indeterminate Pseudo-class
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Selects checkboxes/radios whose state is indeterminate (e.g. set via JS).

title: Invalid CSS Variable Name
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: CSS variables must start with '--'. '$' is for SASS/SCSS.

title: CSS Nesting
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Native CSS nesting (using &) is now supported in modern browsers.

title: Invalid Scope
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: This looks valid (CSS Scoping). Let's make an error. '@scope (.card;)' - invalid delimiter. Or 'scope: div'.

title: Invalid Scope Rule
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The scope root selector must be in parentheses: '@scope (.card)'.

title: Light Dark Function
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Returns the first color for light color schemes and second for dark schemes (dependent on color-scheme property).

title: Invalid Trigonometric Function
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The function is 'sin()', not 'sine()'.

title: Calc Function
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Performs calculations on property string values.

title: Invalid Calc Spacing
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Operators + and - in calc() require whitespace on both sides. '100% - 20px'.

title: Attr Function
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Retrieves the value of an attribute of the selected element.

title: Invalid Media Feature
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Typo: 'min-wdth' should be 'min-width'.

title: Media Range Syntax
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Modern Level 4 range context syntax for media queries.

title: Invalid Keyframe Name
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Animation names cannot start with a digit unless escaped. '123slide' is invalid unescaped.

title: Keyframes Percentage
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Valid syntax using comma-separated percentages.

title: Invalid Important
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Used correctly. Error: 'color: red !impt'. Or '!important' at start of value.

title: Invalid Important Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Must be spelled '!important'.

title: Pointer Events
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Makes the element transparent to pointer events (clicks pass through).

title: Invalid Cursor
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'hand' is an old IE-specific value. Standard is 'pointer'.

title: User Select
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Prevents the user from selecting text in the element.

title: Invalid Appearance
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: This is valid usage. Invalid: 'appearance: magic'.

title: Invalid Appearance Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'shiny' is not a valid appearance value. Common values: 'none', 'auto', 'button', etc.

title: Resizing
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Restricts user resizing to the vertical axis.

title: Invalid Will Change
description: Find the line with the logic warning.
explanation: 'will-change: all' is generally invalid or highly discouraged/ignored because it defeats the purpose of optimization. You should specify properties like 'transform', 'opacity'.

title: Image Rendering Pixelated
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Preserves pixelation when scaling up.

title: Invalid Text Transform
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The value is 'capitalize', not 'capital'.

title: Object Fit Cover
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Resizes the content to cover the element's box, preserving aspect ratio, cropping if needed.

title: Invalid Transition Timing Function
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'smooth' is for scroll-behavior. For transition, use 'linear', 'ease', 'ease-in', 'cubic-bezier()', etc.

title: Transition Delay
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Waits 0.5s before starting the transition effect.

title: Invalid Content String
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Strings in 'content' must be quoted. content: "Hello";

title: Invalid Supports Rule
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: This is valid. Error: '@supports (display: grid, gap: 10px)'. Comma is invalid for logical AND. Error: '@supports display: grid' (missing parens).

title: Supports Missing Parens
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Conditions in @supports must be in parentheses: '@supports (display: grid)'.

title: Supports Selector
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Tests if the browser supports the specified selector syntax.

title: Invalid Property Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid Houdini API usage. Error: 'syntax: color'. Needs quotes and brackets like '<color>'.

title: Invalid Property Syntax Definition
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The syntax descriptor requires quotes and angle brackets: syntax: '<angle>';

title: Empty Property Value
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Variables can have empty values (valid token sequence), but usages might be invalid.

title: Invalid Font Palette
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid. Error: 'override-colors: red'. Must specify index.

title: Invalid Palette Override
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: override-colors requires pairs of palette index and color: '0 red'.

title: Forced Colors
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Detects if user agent has enabled a forced colors mode (e.g. Windows High Contrast).

title: Invalid Masks
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid. Error: 'mask: 10px'. Mask needs image source.

title: Invalid Mask Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: '20px' is not a valid mask value. It implies position/size but needs an image source or keyword.

title: Mask Composite
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Composites multiple mask images.

title: Invalid View Transition
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid syntax for View Transitions API. Error: '::view-transition-group' without argument? It requires tag name.

title: Invalid View Transition Pseudo
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: ::view-transition-group pseudo-element requires a view transition name argument, e.g., ::view-transition-group(root).

title: View Transition Name
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Assigns a name to the element for participating in view transitions.

title: Invalid Zoom
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'zoom' (non-standard but common) accepts number/percentage. 'big' is invalid.

title: Font Smooth
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Controls font rendering (antialiasing) on macOS/Webkit.

title: Invalid Text Rendering
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'fast' is not a value. Use 'optimizeSpeed', 'optimizeLegibility', 'geometricPrecision', 'auto'.

title: Hanging Punctuation
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Allows punctuation marks to hang outside the line box.

title: Invalid Math Style
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'normal', 'compact'. 'bold' is invalid.

title: Speak Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Instructs speech synthesizers not to read the element.

title: Invalid Quotes Syntax
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'quotes' accepts string pairs or 'none'. 'auto' is defined in some specs contextually? Actually 'auto' IS valid in level 3/4. Let's pick 'quotes: 1'.

title: Invalid Quotes Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Quotes must be strings.

title: Ruby Align
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Controls alignment of ruby text.

title: Invalid Text Combine Upright
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'none', 'all', 'digits <number>'. 'maybe' is invalid.

title: Text Justify
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Specifies justification method when text-align is justify.

title: Invalid Hyphenate Character
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Must be a string: hyphenate-character: "&"; (Also double ampersand syntax error in token).

title: Font Variation Settings
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Low-level control over variable font axes.

title: Invalid Font Feature Settings
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Tags must be strings: "liga" on.

title: Font Optical Sizing
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Enables/disables optical sizing for fonts that support it.

title: Invalid Size
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: You cannot specify both portrait and landscape. 'A4 landscape' is valid.

title: Forced Color Adjust
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Opt-out of forced colors (e.g. for color swatches that must remain accurate).

title: Invalid Print Color Adjust
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values are 'economy' or 'exact'. 'always' is invalid.

title: Initial Letter
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Sets the size (3 lines) and sink (2 lines) for drop caps.

title: Invalid Text Emphasis
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid keyword is 'dot' or 'circle'? Wait. 'dot' calls for a string or keyword like 'filled dot'. Actually 'dot' alone is valid in shorthand? 'filled dot' or 'open dot'. 'dot' alone usually means 'filled dot'. Let's check. MDN says 'dot' is a valid shape. Error: 'text-emphasis: huge'.

title: Invalid Text Emphasis Style
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'huge' is not valid. Use 'filled', 'open', 'dot', 'circle', 'double-circle', 'triangle', 'sesame'.

title: Text Emphasis Color
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Sets the color of the emphasis marks.

title: Invalid Paint Order
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: paint-order accepts combinations of 'fill', 'stroke', 'markers'. 'extra' is invalid.

title: Transform Box
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Defines the layout box to which transform and transform-origin relate.

title: Invalid Baseline Source
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values 'auto', 'first', 'last'. 'top' is invalid.

title: Translate Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Individual transform property for translation.

title: Invalid Scale Property
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: scale values must be numbers (factors) or percentages. Lengths like '100px' are invalid.

title: Rotate Property
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Individual transform property for rotation (axis angle).

title: Invalid Layout
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Syntax for masonry (where supported) is usually 'display: masonry' or 'grid-template-rows: masonry'. 'layout()' function is Houdini Layout API. If not defined, invalid. Safest valid error: 'display: block-inline'.

title: Invalid Display Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: The value is 'inline-block'. 'block-inline' is invalid.

title: Transition Behavior
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Allows discrete properties (like display) to participate in transitions.

title: Invalid Overlay
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: overlay property is non-standard/deprecated or 'overlay' keyword for overflow.

title: Field Sizing
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Allows form inputs to auto-grow based on content (modern alternative to rows/cols hacks).

title: Invalid Text Box Trim
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Values are 'none', 'trim-start', 'trim-end', 'both'. 'cut' is invalid.

title: Text Box Edge
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Defines the edge for text-box-trim.

title: Invalid Scrollbar Color
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: scrollbar-color requires 2 colors (thumb track) or 'auto'. One color is insufficient.

title: Scrollbar Width
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Controls the thickness of the scrollbar (auto, thin, none).

title: Invalid Interpolate Size
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Valid values 'allow-keywords' or 'numeric-only'. 'maybe' is invalid.

title: Safe Area Inset
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Uses environment variable for safe area insets (notched phones).

title: Invalid Viewport Unit
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: Typo? No 'dv' unit. Maybe 'dvh' (dynamic viewport height) or 'dvw'. 'dv' is invalid.

title: Small Viewport Height
description: Is this code snippet correct?
explanation: Small Viewport Height (smallest possible viewport when UA UI is expanded).

title: Invalid Pseudo Class Argument
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: This IS valid in Level 4 (nth-child selection). Error: ':nth-child(one)'.

title: Invalid Nth Child Value
description: Find the line with the syntax error.
explanation: 'one' is not a valid argument. Use integers, 'odd', 'even', or 'An+B'.
